Par défaut, les magazines sont triés par: By default, the magazines are ordered by country and by magazine. You can change this order by moving the magazines names on the {link_to_bookcase_options} page.
Parce que votre bibliothèque est unique,: Since your bookcase is unique, DucksManager allows you to choose among different types of wood, for the bookcase and for its shelves.
Pour cela, créez une nouvelle collection: To do so, create a DucksManager collection or login to your existing DucksManager collection, then select "{0}" in the menu.

Prenez le temps de découvrir les fonctio:
Take the time to discover how DucksManager will change the way you manage your Disney comic books collection.

You can add or remove issues from the demo collection, but remember that every hour all the user-generated data will be removed.
If you want to log out of the demo mode in order to sign up or to login to your real collection, use the link in the left menu.
